title: Practising headsprings
brief_description: A demonstration of training methods for performing headsprings. Introductory shot of clowns doing headsprings in the circus ring. The remainder of the film is photographed in a gymnasium; an expert gymnast demonstrates practice movements for different parts of the activity and shows how these parts are combined in the complete headspring.
